org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term

Class LinearLossTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term.ADMMObjectiveTerm
      • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term.LinearLossTerm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Term, WeightedTerm

    public class LinearLossTerm
extends ADMMObjectiveTerm
implements WeightedTerm
    ADMMReasoner objective term of the form
    weight * coeffs^T * x
